title: Counselling
content: I didn't recieve any mail from pes about the counselling process. Someone shared a mail they got from them about the offline counselling on 17-18 but I didn't recieve any. I would have to travel half the country for the counselling but they haven't even informed me of it. They don't reply to email or pick up calls. What am I supposed to do?

comments.body: Counselling will be usually in June,July,August
might be cuz u got a rank lesser than 8k. if you did, then you'll have to wait for round 2 counselling
